FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our solutions and services.

integration.question: How do I integrate Ma'a Suh Pay into my e-commerce site?
integration.answer: Integration is simple and fast thanks to our robust and well-documented APIs. We also offer ready-to-use plugins for major CMS platforms (WooCommerce, Shopify, Magento). Our technical team is available to assist you throughout the integration phase.

security.question: What security standards do you apply for data protection?
security.answer: We apply a 'Security by Design' approach. Our infrastructures are ISO 27001 certified and our payment solutions strictly comply with PCI-DSS Level 1. All sensitive data is encrypted end-to-end (AES-256) and we perform regular penetration tests.

support.question: Do you offer local technical support?
support.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated local support team available 24/7 for our Enterprise clients. We believe in proximity to quickly resolve your issues and ensure business continuity.

crm.question: What are the benefits of the Ma'a Suh CRM & ERP suite?
crm.answer: Our suite is specifically designed for the African context. It unifies management of your clients, inventory, accounting and HR in a single interface. This gives you a 360° view of your business, reduces manual errors and accelerates decision-making.

customization.question: Can I customize features according to my needs?
customization.answer: Absolutely. While our SaaS solutions are ready to use, our 'Custom Development' team can adapt each module to your company's specific processes or develop exclusive features to give you a competitive advantage.

Contact.title: Have a question? Need a quote?
